sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './Research.css'; const Research = () => { return (
{/* Desktop */}

Research

We conducted user research, analyzed frequent support inquiries about payment management, and interviewed users to identify challenges with order tracking and service access. A competitive analysis of industry leaders also informed our design, guiding feature prioritization and improving the user experience.

{/* Tablet */}

Research

We conducted user research, analyzed frequent support inquiries about payment management, and interviewed users to identify challenges with order tracking and service access. A competitive analysis of industry leaders also informed our design, guiding feature prioritization and improving the user experience.

{/* Mobile */}

Research

We conducted user research, analyzed frequent support inquiries about payment management, and interviewed users to identify challenges with order tracking and service access. A competitive analysis of industry leaders also informed our design, guiding feature prioritization and improving the user experience.

); }; export default Research;
